comments:
I am trying to use the Version Change delegate for EJB, App Client, Connector
facets and i am getting the following exception thrown when i try to change the
Facet Version. The MultiStatus that is thrown by this CoreException is

Status ERROR: org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core code=0 One or more
constraints have not been satisfied. null children=[Cannot change version of
project facet Application Client module to 1.3.].

This error is thrown on this Project Facet Valdidaton

Action.Type.VERSION_CHANGE  - > ValidationProblem.Type.VERSION_CHANGE_NOT_SUPPORTED;

In WTP, we are not adding version changed delagates For WTP 1.0.

This function will not be supported.
Chuck, As per our discussion on this function to be added in WTP in 1.5 reopening it for 1.5
We will add this as a feature enhancement in 1.5
changing target from 1.5 M1 to 1.5 M5 to reflect new numbering system as we join Collisto.
*** Bug 120724 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 142352 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

I don't consider this so much an enhancement request as missing function.  Once I've installed a web module facet I can't change it or uninstall it, I'm stuck at whatever level I chose the first time.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 182210 ***
